meanings.definition: The act of dislodging or being dislodged from a place or position.
meanings.sent1: The sudden dislodgments of rocks caused a loud noise in the valley.
meanings.sent2: The dislodgments of the books from the shelf startled the librarian.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgments of the puzzle pieces made completing it even more challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her dislodgments of excuses were finally exposed by her boss.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgments of the snow from the roof created a beautiful cascade.

meanings.definition: Instances of something being removed or displaced from its original location.
meanings.sent1: The dislodgments of the keys from the keychain were frustrating.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the dislodgments of branches littered the yard.
meanings.sent3: The dislodgments of the cookies from the jar mysteriously happened overnight.
meanings.sent4: The dislodgments of trust in their relationship were irreparable.
meanings.sent5: The dislodgments of sand from the dunes revealed hidden treasures.
